Title: Central People's Broadcasting Station Program Schedule (Effective from November 8, 1976)
Designer: Hou Yimin (候一民)Deng Shu (邓树)Jin Shangyi (靳尚谊)Luo Gongliu (罗工柳)Yuan Hao (袁浩)Yang Lin'gui (杨林贵)Zhan Jianjun (詹建俊)
Notes: The well-known painting of Mao meeting Red Guards, made for the 1972 National Art Exhibition in Beijing by a group of professors from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, re-used on a program schedule of the Central People's Broadcasting Station. The radio programs start on 06:00, and include special broadcasts “to minorities” and “to Taiwan province”.
